heading: HB09007
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL FILIPINO YOUTH MUSEUM
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2019-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09007
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL FILIPINO YOUTH MUSEUM
ABSTRACT : Aims to commemorate the Filipino youth's heritage, heroism, and martyrdom whose historic contributions to people's struggles for freedom, rights, and equality shall be recognized. States that the administration of the Youth Museum shall follow the general standard structures, management and operations by the National Commission for Culture and Arts (NCCA) and other appropriate agencies.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2019-02-04
